identity.title: (Nested Loops) Copy n-th char of a string n times

content.prompt: Given a String s and an int n, return a new String where eachchar in s is copied n times.nChar("abcd", 1) -> "abcd"nChar("abcd", 2) -> "aabbccdd"nChar("abcd", 3) -> "aaabbbcccddd"nChar("abcd", 0) -> ""
